assistants.instructions: You are Sila, an AI assistant. Be direct in all responses.

messages.text: Hello! Can you help me get started with Sila?

children.text:
Welcome to Sila! I'm here to help you get started. Sila is an open alternative to ChatGPT that keeps your data private and doesn't require subscriptions.

What would you like to know about?

Sila has several great features:

• **Workspaces** - Organize conversations and assistants
• **Local first** - Use without relying on Sila servers
• **Tabs like VSCode** - Create and switch between tabs
• **Any AI** - From OpenAI to Ollama, bring your own keys
• **Many themes** - From colorful to boring
• **Assistants** - Create your own with custom prompts
• **No subscriptions** - Pay as you go for API costs

Would you like me to explain any of these in more detail?
